original_text: And the people came to Bethel and sat there till evening before God, and they lifted up their voices and wept bitterly.
korean_text: 백성이 벧엘에 이르러 거기서 저녁까지 하나님 앞에 앉아서 큰 소리로 울며

sentences.original_text: And the people came to Bethel
and sat there till evening before God
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님 앞에서 저녁까지 거기 앉아 있었다

sentences.original_text: and they lifted up their voices
